languages.text: Персонаж оглушен и вынужден пропустить ход! Пока действует эффект оглушения, персонаж не может {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняться{/g} и совершать {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаки по возможности{/g}. Атакуя оглушенную цель, враги получают бонусы на попадание по ней.
languages.original_text: The character is {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} and is forced to skip one {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}! While stun is active, the character cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or perform {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. When attacking a stunned target, enemies gain hit {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}.

Пока действует эффект оглушения, персонаж не может {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклоняться{/g} и совершать {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаки по возможности{/g}. Атакуя оглушенную цель, враги получают бонусы на попадание по ней.

When attacking a stunned target, enemies gain hit {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The character is stunned! In this state, they skip one turn.
While stun is active, the character cannot parry, dodge, or make attacks of opportunity. When attacking a stunned target, enemies gain hit bonuses.

The character is {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} and is forced to skip one {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}! While stun is active, the character cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or perform {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. When attacking a stunned target, enemies gain hit {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}.

The character is {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} and is forced to skip one {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}! While stun is active, the character cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or perform {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. When attacking a stunned target, enemies gain hit {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}.

The character is {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} and is forced to skip one {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}! While stun is active, the character cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g}, or perform {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. When attacking a stunned target, enemies gain hit {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}.

The character is {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} and is forced to skip one {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}! While stun is active, the character cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or perform {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. When attacking a stunned target, enemies gain hit {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}.

languages.text: ¡El personaje está {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} y tiene que saltarse un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}! Mientras esté aturdido, no puede {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parar{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} ni realizar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. Al atacar a un objetivo aturdido, los enemigos ganan {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} al impacto.
languages.original_text: The character is {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} and is forced to skip one {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}! While stun is active, the character cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or perform {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. When attacking a stunned target, enemies gain hit {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ¡El personaje está {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} y tiene que saltarse un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}! Mientras esté aturdido, no puede {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parar{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquivar{/g} ni realizar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. Al atacar a un objetivo aturdido, los enemigos ganan {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} al {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g}.

languages.text: キャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}状態となり、強制的に{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}スキップとなる！ スタン効果が有効な間、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を行うことができない。スタン状態のるターゲットを攻撃するとき、敵はヒット{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を獲得する。
languages.original_text: The character is {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} and is forced to skip one {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}! While stun is active, the character cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or perform {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. When attacking a stunned target, enemies gain hit {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}.

traits.locale_text: そのキャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}させられ、1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}強制的にスキップされる！ スタンが有効な間、キャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を行うことができない。気絶しているターゲットを攻撃するとき、敵は{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。

languages.text: 该角色处于{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态，将会强制跳过下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}！ 处于眩晕状态的角色无法{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，也无法发动{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}。当攻击眩晕的目标时，命中率会获得{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。
languages.original_text: The character is {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} and is forced to skip one {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}! While stun is active, the character cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or perform {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. When attacking a stunned target, enemies gain hit {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 该角色处于{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态，将会强制跳过下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}！ 处于眩晕状态的角色无法{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}，也无法发动{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}。当攻击眩晕的目标时，{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中率{/g}会获得{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。

languages.text: Der Charakter ist {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} und muss einen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} aussetzen! Solange "Betäubung" aktiv ist, kann der Charakter nicht {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} ausführen. Greifen Gegner ein betäubtes Ziel an, erhalten sie {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Trefferboni{/g}.
languages.original_text: The character is {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} and is forced to skip one {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}! While stun is active, the character cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or perform {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. When attacking a stunned target, enemies gain hit {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Charakter ist {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} und gezwungen, eine {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} auszusetzen! Während Betäubung aktiv ist, kann der Charakter nicht {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}ausweichen{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} ausführen. Wenn sie ein betäubtes Ziel angreifen, erhalten Gegner {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g}.

languages.text: Le personnage est {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdi{/g} et obligé de passer un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} ! Tant que l'étourdissement est actif, le personnage n'est pas en mesure de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} ou d'effectuer des {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. Lorsqu'ils attaquent une cible étourdie, les ennemis bénéficient de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de coup.
languages.original_text: The character is {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} and is forced to skip one {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}! While stun is active, the character cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or perform {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. When attacking a stunned target, enemies gain hit {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le personnage est {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdi{/g} et obligé de passer un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} ! Tant que l'étourdissement est actif, le personnage n’est pas en mesure de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g}, d’{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiver{/g} ou d’effectuer des {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. Lorsqu'ils attaquent une cible étourdie, les ennemis bénéficient de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g}.

languages.text: Karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemledi{/g} ve bir {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} atlamak zorunda kaldı! Sersemlik aktifken karakter {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} yapamaz, {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}fırsat saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştiremez. Sersemlemiş bir hedefe saldıran düşmanlar, vuruş {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusları{/g} kazanırlar.
languages.original_text: The character is {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} and is forced to skip one {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}! While stun is active, the character cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or perform {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. When attacking a stunned target, enemies gain hit {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}.
